column3: sgra ni nges par rtogs pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa dang  sgrub pa nyams su len pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i mkhas pa'i dbang du byas te bshad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#958655#958668#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8845;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8846;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8847# dngos po rnams 'gags te zhes pa rnams slar yang bzlas nas sngon gyi rang bzhin du skye ba med  pa'i phyir te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#958669#958679#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8846;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8847# 'dis ni zhig pa rang bzhin med pa bstan to // / +yang na mu stegs pa grangs can pa rnams kyis zhig pa rnams kyang thams cad nas thams cad du med par song ba ma yin gyi mngon par gnas so zhes smras pa ltar gnas pa'i rang bzhin med pas na ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de ltar gzhung gi don bsdu na lnga yin te / / +bsgrub par bya ba dang  bye brag tu shes par bya ba dang  bsam par bya ba dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  yongs su grub pa mthar thug pa'i don no // /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#958915#958928#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8887;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8888;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8889;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8890;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8891# de'ang ci ltar grub ce na snga ma snga ma la brten nas / / +phyi ma phyi ma 'grub pa'o // / +'di la rang bzhin med pa la brten nas skye ba med par 'grub bo // /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#958985#958997#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8898;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8899# gang skye ba dang 'gag par kun du brtags pa'i chos de nyid la thog ma nas zhi ba zhes bya'o // / +'di ltar skye ba dang 'jig  pas dkrugs shing sog le rnon pos dras pa'i 'du byed rnams la ni 'phags la rnams skyo bar mdzad kyi skye ba dang 'gag pa spongs pa'i bdud rtsi'i dbyings la ni 'phags pa rnams dgyes par mdzad pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#958998#959009#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8899;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8900# 'di ltar skye ba dang 'jig  pas dkrugs shing sog le rnon pos dras pa'i 'du byed rnams la ni 'phags la rnams skyo bar mdzad kyi skye ba dang 'gag pa spongs pa'i bdud rtsi'i dbyings la ni 'phags pa rnams dgyes par mdzad pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: nyid dang  bstan par bya ba'i chos theg pa mchog tu gyur pa'o // / +de lnga ni tshigs bcad dang po'i don te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959008#959018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8899;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8900;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8901;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8902# 'di ltar skye ba dang 'jig  pas dkrugs shing sog le rnon pos dras pa'i 'du byed rnams la ni 'phags la rnams skyo bar mdzad kyi skye ba dang 'gag pa spongs pa'i bdud rtsi'i dbyings la ni 'phags pa rnams dgyes par mdzad pa'i phyir ro // / +gang thog ma nas zhi ba'i chos de nyid la rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang  de la bya ste / /

column3: dpe lngas mtshon pa'i don lnga ste / / +mdor bstan pa'o // / +de lnga'i rgyas par bshad pa ni 'di yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959017#959026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8900;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8901;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8902# gang thog ma nas zhi ba'i chos de nyid la rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang  de la bya ste / / +de nyid la yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to // /

column3: don shes kyi rgyas bshad ni dmigs par bya ba'i yul theg  pa chen po'i rgyu 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i byang chub kyi skabs kyi bar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959027#959039#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8902;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8903;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8904# yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid de rang bzhin gyis ye nas gnas kyi lam bsgoms bas bskyed pa ma yin pas na rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: don ston gyi rgyas bshad ni theg pa chen po la mos pa chos tshol ba ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa'i skabs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959040#959051#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8903;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8904;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yongs su tshol ba las  brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa'o zhes bya ba la / / +mdo sde de dang de dag gi nang nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'o zhes gsungs ba la / /

column3: rab tu byed pa ngag dang tshig rnams dri med kyi rgyas bshad ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896431#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959052#959059#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8906# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943293#943295#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981739#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892210#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907094#907095#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2117# byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid du rang bzhin bstan par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924894#924894#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374# de yang bzod pa 'di 'dra bas sems can 'di ltar smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897141#897141#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013# skur pa btab na ngan song du lhung ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ba dang  skrag na yang rgyu gang gi sa skrag pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915711#915711#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3202# phyin ci log de skyon yin pas spang dgos bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column24: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904921#904921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1899# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod kyang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhi'i skyon dang ldan na skyon des bsgribs pas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i  spyod pa la 'jug par mi nus par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column25: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981019#981019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11612# skrag pa de spang pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhin rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911264#911265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2624# sems  can gyi don gyi phyir dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pas / / +skyo ba'i 'jigs pa med par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column27: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916652#916652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3328# de bas na bdag dang chos med par yang mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dang   'khor bar skye rung bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column28: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912824#912824#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column29: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925102#925102#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405# de yang brtson 'grus ji lta bus  sems can 'di 'dra bar yongs su smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: sdug bsngal bsgral phyir gyi rgyas bshad ni / / +sgrub pa'i skabs nas tshad med pa rnam par dbye ba'i bar ro // /

column3: 'gro la snying rje'i phyir te de'i bdag nyid kyi rgyas bshad ni rnam par dbye ba las brtsams pa man chad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959081#959097#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8911;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8912;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8913;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8914# skye ba med pa'i chos brgyad la // / +bzod pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya bar gsungs te / /

column3: theg mchog bstan pa'i rnam pa'i chos kyi rgyas bshad ni ngo tsha  rnam par dbye ba nas bzung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959097#959111#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8914;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8915# thog ma skye ba med pa dang   de nyid skye ba med pa dang  gzhan skye ba med pa dang  rang gi mtshan nyid skye pa med pa dang  rang skye ba med pa dang  gzhan du 'gyur ba skye ba med ba dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa skye ba med pa dang  bye brag tu skye ba med pa'o // /

column3: mthar thug pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs kyi bar gyis so // / +de ltar lus rnam par gzhag pa dang  yan lag rgyas par bshad pa'i tshul gnyis su bshad pas mdo sde'i don bshad pa yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959112#959124#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8914;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8915;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8916# thog ma skye ba med pa dang   de nyid skye ba med pa dang  gzhan skye ba med pa dang  rang gi mtshan nyid skye pa med pa dang  rang skye ba med pa dang  gzhan du 'gyur ba skye ba med ba dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa skye ba med pa dang  bye brag tu skye ba med pa'o // / +thog ma ni 'khor ba ste de la thog ma skye ba med do zhes bya ba la la la dag / /
column5: 0.009#TD4029E.TXT.r#2138688#2138691#TD4029E.TXT.r_2372# thog ma ni 'khor ba la ste de la thog ma skye ba med do zhes bya ba ni gang dag 'khor ba thog ma  dang ldan par rtog par byed pa'i 'khor ba'i thog ma kun brtags pa de la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ste / /
column6: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#291238#291239#TD4026E.TXT.r_2836;TD4026E.TXT.r_2837;TD4026E.TXT.r_2838# chos brgyad la skye ba med par bzod pa ni mi skye ba'i chos bzod pa'o // / +de thog ma ni 'khor ba la ste / / +de la thog ma skye ba med do // /

column3: tshigs bcad gnyis pas rgyan bshad de / / +theg pa  chen po'i chos ni dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir mdo sde'i rgyan ces bya ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959125#959132#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8916# 'khor ba la thog ma yod par rtog ste 'khor ba la thag ma yod par brtags pa'i 'khor ba la thog mar skye ba med par mthong ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: gal te lus can dga' ba bskyed pas rgyan yin na / / +'di la dri ba lnga 'byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959133#959142#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8916;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8917# 'khor ba la thog ma yod par rtog ste 'khor ba la thag ma yod par brtags pa'i 'khor ba la thog mar skye ba med par mthong ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya'o // / +de'ang 'di skad 'khor ba ni ma rig pa la sogs pa yan lag bcu gnyis gcig gis gcig bskyed pas na thog ma med pa dbang    phyag dang tshangs pa la sogs pa gang gis kyang 'khor ba'i thog ma bskyed pa med do zhes bzod na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: dri ba dang po ni theg pa chen po 'di bkar grub na bcom ldan 'das las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sgra dang don ci zhig byams pas  bogs dbyung du yod nas dga' ba skyed par byed ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959143#959153#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8917# de'ang 'di skad 'khor ba ni ma rig pa la sogs pa yan lag bcu gnyis gcig gis gcig bskyed pas na thog ma med pa dbang    phyag dang tshangs pa la sogs pa gang gis kyang 'khor ba'i thog ma bskyed pa med do zhes bzod na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959153#959161#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8917;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8918# de'ang 'di skad 'khor ba ni ma rig pa la sogs pa yan lag bcu gnyis gcig gis gcig bskyed pas na thog ma med pa dbang    phyag dang tshangs pa la sogs pa gang gis kyang 'khor ba'i thog ma bskyed pa med do zhes bzod na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: lan du / / +gzugs rgyan rang bzhin yon tan ldan pa me long nang song na la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959162#959175#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8918;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8919;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8920# de nyid dang gzhan ni snga ma dang phyi ma la zhes bya ba la sngar skyes pa de ni slar mi skye la / /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959172#959188#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8919;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8920;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8921# phyi ma grags ba'i skye ba rnams kyang ji ltar grags pa'i chos  la gzhan mi skye zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959222#959230#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8926;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8927;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8924;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8925;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8928# ji ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // / +gzhan mi skye ba'i don rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir gzhan dag kyang ma yin te / /
column6: 0.013#TD4026E.TXT.r#291249#291249#TD4026E.TXT.r_2840# 'khor ba na chos gang dag sngar skyes  pa de dag nyid skye ba ni med de / /
column7: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#894380#894381#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_715# stong pa zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang tshig gzhan la don gzhan 'byung bas brtag dka' ba'i phyir dka' ba'o // /
column8: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1226741#1226741#TD4047E.TXT.r_14958# dri ma'i  don dang mi mthun pa'i don 'di kun nas nyon mongs pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir thob par bya ba la gegs byed pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya bas bstan to // /

column3: lan du / / +ji ltar bsnams na rab dku la man chad smos so // / +dri ba gsum pa ni theg pa chen po las bskal pa dpag tu med par dka' ba spyad pa sna tshogs 'byung bas de'i phyir dga' ba bskyed pa ma yin no zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959189#959196#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8921;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8922# gang sngar skyes ba'i chos de dag skye ba med de de'i dngos por mi skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#894379#894381#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_715# stong pa zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang tshig gzhan la don gzhan 'byung bas brtag dka' ba'i phyir dka' ba'o // /
