column9: 0.023#TD4069E.TXT.r#659643#659644#TD4069E.TXT.r_5211;TD4069E.TXT.r_5212# mdo sde'i don bshad pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir te / / +mdo sde'i don gzhan bshad pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: 'di las ni gzhan la phan pa'i phyir rang la sdug bsngal bskyed pas dga' ba ma yin no zhe na / / +lan du / /
column4: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#894380#894380#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_715# stong pa zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang tshig gzhan la don gzhan 'byung bas brtag dka' ba'i phyir dka' ba'o // /

column3: rin chen rigs ldan rin thang med la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959231#959238#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8928;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8929;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8930;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8931# snga ma med pa'i rnam par mi skye ba'i phyir ro zhes smos te / / +'khor ba na phyis skye ba'i chos rnams kyang gzhan yang skye ba ma yin te / /

column3: dri ba lnga pa ni thun mong du grags pa'i sdud pa po med pa'i phyir dang  bdag cag la grags pa kho na theg pa chen po yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959239#959256#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8929;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8930;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8931;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8933# 'khor ba na phyis skye ba'i chos rnams kyang gzhan yang skye ba ma yin te / / +ci'i phyir zhe na / / +ji ltar grags pa'i chos phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa nyid skye bar zad kyi / /
column5: 0.012#TD4054E.TXT.r#1010406#1010406#TD4054E.TXT.r_3270;TD4054E.TXT.r_3271# gzugs can ma yin pa dang  bstan du yod pa dang  bstan du med pa la sogs pa de dag kyang / / +phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched rnams kyis bsdus par ji ltar rigs par blta bar bya ste / /
column6: 0.028#TD4018E.TXT.r#3016943#3016943#TD4018E.TXT.r_1773# so sor snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i khyad par gyis 'gyur ba dang  de bzhin du thos pa dang sems pa'i ye shes kyis phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched  la sogs pa so sor snang bas gang zag la bdag med pa'o // /

column3: theg pa chen po bka' ma yin no zhe na / / +lan du / / +sngar lung ma bstan lhan cig byung man chad smos so // /
column4: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959329#959332#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8944;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8945# rgyu dang rkyen gyi mthu las skyes pa'i rang nyid skye bar mi rung ba'i phyir te / / +de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959440#959442#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8960;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8961# sangs rgyas kha cig ni chos kyi sku ci 'dra bar skyes kha cig ni ci 'dra bar skye ba lta bur mi mthun par skye ba med pa'i phyir te / / +de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.007#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959216#959218#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8925;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8926# slar yod pa'i dngos por mi skye ba'i phyir te / / +ji ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959365#959366#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8951;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8952# yongs su grub ba ni nam mkha' bzhin du rtag cing ro gcig ba yin pas de la nams kyang gzhan nas gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir te / / +de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod ba yin no zhes  pa'i don to // /

column3: mdor gzhag pa las 'phros so // / +bstan bcos kyi rnam gzhag gzhan yang tshigs bcad dang po gnyis kyis bstan bcos kyi  mtshan bshad pa dang  de las 'phros pas le'u dang pos lus mdor gzhag bstan / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959262#959271#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8933;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8934;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8935;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8936# de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la  bzod pa bya ba'i don to // / +rang gi mtshan nyid ni kun du brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyis te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959272#959285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8935;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8936;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8937;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8938# de la nam yang skye ba med do zhes bya ba la / / +rang gi mtshan nyid ni mi skye ba ni kun du brtags pa'i rang bzhin rnams la skye ba med pa'i phyir te / /

column3: skyabs 'gro bsnan pas rgyas bshad bstan / / +nye bar len pa'i rgyu rigs dang  rkyen sems bskyed nas 'bras bu mthar thug gi bar gyis shin tu rgyas par bshad pa bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959286#959313#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8938;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8939;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8940;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8941;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8942# gang zag dang chos su brtags pa thams cad ni ri bong  gi rva bzhin du thams cad nas thams cad du med na de nam yang skye ba dang 'byung ba med pa'i phyir te / /
column5: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959440#959442#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8960;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8961# sangs rgyas kha cig ni chos kyi sku ci 'dra bar skyes kha cig ni ci 'dra bar skye ba lta bur mi mthun par skye ba med pa'i phyir te / / +de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: rgyal ba byams pas mdzad  pa'i bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan gyi thog mar mtshan bshad pa'i sgo nas lus rnam par gzhag pa la gsum ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959313#959322#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8941;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8942;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8943;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8944# rang nyid mi skye ba na gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid de / / +ci'i phyir  zhe na / /
column5: 0.027#TD4048E.TXT.r#1688715#1688715#TD4048E.TXT.r_681;TD4048E.TXT.r_682# de ji ltar na gzhan gyi  dbang yin la / / +ci'i phyir na gzhan gyi dbang zhes bya zhe na / /

column3: byed pa dang  bya ba dang  dgos pa'o // / +byed pa la rnam par dbye ba bdun te / / +dbye ba po dang  byed pa'i las dang  byed pa dang  byed pa po'i ched dang  rgyu'i don dang  'brel  pa'i don dang  gnas kyi don no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959321#959347#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8943;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8944;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8945;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8946;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8947;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8948;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8949;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8950# gzhan gyi dbang gi chos rnams ni // / +rgyu dang rkyen gyi mthu las skyes pa'i rang nyid skye bar mi rung ba'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.006#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959214#959218#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8925;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8926# slar yod pa'i dngos por mi skye ba'i phyir te / / +ji ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959364#959366#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8951;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8952# yongs su grub ba ni nam mkha' bzhin du rtag cing ro gcig ba yin pas de la nams kyang gzhan nas gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir te / / +de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod ba yin no zhes  pa'i don to // /
column7: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1218300#1218300#TD4047E.TXT.r_13758;TD4047E.TXT.r_13759# de'i phyir bzod pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste / / +de rnam par dag pas bsgom pa'i rab kyi mthar thug par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir de dag mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa yan chad ces bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: bya ba ni lnga ste / / +bsgrub par bya ba dang  bye brag tu shes par bya ba dang  bsam par bya ba dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  yongs su grub pa rtogs pa'i don so so rang rig par bya ba byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa nyid // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959347#959355#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8949;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8950;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8951# ba skye ba med PA NI YONGS SU GRUB pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +ci'i phyir zhe na / /

column3: de theg pa chen po mdo sde'i  rgyan 'dis rim pa bzhin rnam par bkrol bas mkhas pa dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir rgyan du gzhag go // /
column4: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959331#959332#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8944;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8945# rgyu dang rkyen gyi mthu las skyes pa'i rang nyid skye bar mi rung ba'i phyir te / / +de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: chos de rang bzhin gyis rgyan dang ldan na bstan bcos 'dis rgyan du byas pa ci yod ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959370#959378#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8952;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8953;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8954# de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod ba yin no zhes  pa'i don to // / +nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i zab pa'i ye shes thob pa rnams la kun nas nyon mongs pa skye bar mi mthong zhes bya ba la / /

column3: gzugs rgyan rang bzhin la sogs pa smos so // / +dgos pa ni phan yon rnam pa gsum ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959379#959395#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8953;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8954# nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i zab pa'i ye shes thob pa rnams la kun nas nyon mongs pa skye bar mi mthong zhes bya ba la / / +kun nas nyon mongs pa skye ba med pa ni 'di ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang  bsgom pas spang par bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs nas zad  pa'i ye shes thob pa rnams phyis sems kyi rgyud la kun nas nyon mongs pa skye bar mi mthong ste / /

column3: sgrib pa  spong ba dang  dbang 'byor pa'i rgyu dang  'phags pa'i nor la longs spyod pa'i rgyu'o // /
kha cig 'di skad du / / +'di bka' ma yin na phan yon lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam pa la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959396#959405#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8954;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8955;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8956# kun nas nyon mongs pa skye ba med pa ni 'di ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang  bsgom pas spang par bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs nas zad  pa'i ye shes thob pa rnams phyis sems kyi rgyud la kun nas nyon mongs pa skye bar mi mthong ste / / +'phags pa de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa skye bar mi mthong ba yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi bka' nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin te / / +gtan tshigs dang  bsgrub bya bla na med     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959404#959414#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8955;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8956;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8957;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8958# 'phags pa de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa skye bar mi mthong ba yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: pa'i thabs su grub pa dang  de la skrag pa'i nyes dmigs rgyu dang bcas pa dang  skrag par mi bya ba'i gtan tshigs dang  dgag pa mi 'grub pa'i rgyu mtshan dang  gnas ma yin pa la skrag mi dgos pa dang  ma mos pa nyid kyis grub pa dang  rang gis  ma thos pa spang bar mi rigs pa dang  spong ba'i rgyu tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dgag pa dang  khong du ma chud pas spang bar mi rigs pa ste bcu pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959413#959425#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8957;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8958;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8959;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8960# bdag la bye brag tu skye ba med  do zhes bya ba la / / +bye brag tu skye ba med pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959425#959436#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8959;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8960# sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku ni rang bzhin gcig pa yin la / / +sangs rgyas kha cig ni chos kyi sku ci 'dra bar skyes kha cig ni ci 'dra bar skye ba lta bur mi mthun par skye ba med pa'i phyir te / /
column6: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959328#959332#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8944;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8945# rgyu dang rkyen gyi mthu las skyes pa'i rang nyid skye bar mi rung ba'i phyir te / / +de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959365#959366#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8951;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8952# yongs su grub ba ni nam mkha' bzhin du rtag cing ro gcig ba yin pas de la nams kyang gzhan nas gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir te / / +de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod ba yin no zhes  pa'i don to // /
column8: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2919989#2919990#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7288;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7289# gnas kyi dngos por skye ba la ni gnas par mi srid pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba la / /
column9: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959294#959294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8938;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8939# gang zag dang chos su brtags pa thams cad ni ri bong  gi rva bzhin du thams cad nas thams cad du med na de nam yang skye ba dang 'byung ba med pa'i phyir te / / +de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2918522#2918522#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7119# thog mar skye ba dang  je bas je cher skye ba dang  sogs pa skye ba dang gnas kyi dngos por skye ba dang  'gyur bar skye ba dang  smin par skye ba dang  tha ma'i skye ba dang  de bzhin du  mchog gi skye ba dang  'od gsal bar skye ba dang  'od mi gsal bar skye ba dang  yul gzhan du 'gro ba'i skye ba dang  sa bon can gyi skye ba dang  sa bon med pa'i skye ba dang  gzugs brnyan du skye ba ste / /
column11: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#821245#821245#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9149# ci ste skye ba don med par 'gyur du 'ong bas de'i phyir thob pas skye ba skyed par byed la / /
column12: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#938820#938820#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6303# de ltar mnyam pa nyid kyi  ye shes byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pa'i phyir / /
column13: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1220778#1220778#TD4047E.TXT.r_14091;TD4047E.TXT.r_14092# snying brtse ba sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir skye bar 'gyur ba'o // / +de dang skal ba mnyam par mthun par 'jug pa'i skye ba ni phan tshun mi mthun pa'i dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes nas rang nyid kyi byams pa'i sems kyis  khon rnams zhi bar byed do // /

column3: de la sngar lung ma bstan pa la sogs pa gtan tshigs bdun no // / +sngar lung ma bstan pas sgrub pa ma nges pa spang ba dang   yod med kyis ma grub pa spang ba dang  spyod yul ma yin pa sgrub par byed pa ste gsum mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959447#959457#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8961;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8962;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8963# de ltar bzod pa yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // / +theg pa gcig yongs su tshol ba la yang tshigs su bcad pa bdun no zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959458#959467#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8963;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8964;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8965# mdo sde kha cig las ni theg pa gcig tu bshad de gsum du med do zhes bshad do // /

column3: theg pa chen por grub pa'i dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro bar mos pa bsgrub par bya ba la dgu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959467#959475#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8964;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8965;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8966;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8967# mdo sde kha cig las ni gsum mo zhes bshad  pa ni ci la dgongs she na / / +gsung rab la sde rnam pa gnyis te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2901031#2901037#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4646;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4647;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4648;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4649# tshad mar gyur pas bshad pa'i don // / +zhes bya ba la / / +mdo sde la yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column6: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2901369#2901369#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4701;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4702# de la nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde ni ji lta bu / / +drang po'i don gyi mdo sde ni ji lta bu zhe na / /

column3: skyabs su 'gro ba mchog gi khyad par dang  de la spro bar bya ba dang  de'i ngo bo dang  rgyu dang   'bras bu dang  las dang  ldan pa dang  dbye ba dang  phan yon no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959476#959499#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8966;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8967;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8968;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8969;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8970;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8971# bkri ba'i don gyi mdo sde dang / / +nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde'o // /

column3: de la skyabs su 'gro ba'i khyad par ni / / +kun tu 'gro ba la sogs pa bzhi'o // /
de'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir rigs yod pa dang  med pa dang  rigs kyi dbye ba dang  'bras bu khyad par du  'phags pa ste bzhi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959500#959520#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8970;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8971;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8972;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8973;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8974# theg pa gsum yod pa las theg pa gcig tu bshad pa / / +ci las dgongs te bshad pa'i dgongs pa brtags pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bdun rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981059#981059#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11617# skrag pa de spang pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhi rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: yod pa yang // / +yod dang mchog dang mtshan nyid dang / / +rtags dang rigs rab dbye ba dang / /
column4: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316411#2316411#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_645;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_646# chos dang bdag med grol mtshungs phyir // / +rigs ni tha dad gyur pa'i phyir // /
column5: 0.020#TD4020E.TXT.r#2525101#2525101#TD4020E.TXT.r_1153;TD4020E.TXT.r_1154# chos dang bdag med grol ba rnams // / +mtshungs phyir rigs ni tha dad phyir // /

column3: nyes dmigs dang ni phan yon dang / / +dpe rnams gnyis te rnam pa bzhi ste rnam pa dgu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959521#959528#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8973;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8974;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8975;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8976;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8977# tha dad rigs dang bsam gnyis thob // / +sprul    ba dang ni mthar thug phyir // /
column5: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960283#960284#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9072;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9073# sangs rgyas nyid theg pa gcig go zhes bya ba la / / +mthar thug pa'i phyir theg pa gcig tu bshad de  mthar thug pa zhes bya ba dang  mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba dang  phul du phyin pa zhes bya ba dag don gcig ste / /

column3: de'i rkyen nang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i bdag nyid sems bskyed  pa rnam pa bcu gsum ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959529#959539#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8975;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8977;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8976# theg pa gcig pa nyid yin no // / +theg pa gcig tu bshad pa'i dgongs pa ni chos mtshungs pa dang  bdag med pa mtshungs pa dang  grol ba mtshungs pa dang  rigs tha dad pa theg pa mtshungs pa dang  bsam pa gnyis thob pa dang  sprul pa'i phyir / /

column3: mtshan nyid dang  rab tu dbye ba dang  rnam par gzhag pa dang  yang dag par blangs pa dha las byung ba dang  don dam pa dang  dpe'i che ba dang  sems ma bskyed pa smad pa dang  bskyed pa bsngags pa dang  mi byed pa'i sdom pa 'thob pa dang  sems mi  ldog pa dang  sdug bsngal gyis mi 'jigs pa dang  sems can yal bar mi 'dor ba dang  le lo mi rigs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959538#959547#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8977;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8978;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8979# theg pa gcig tu bshad pa'i dgongs pa ni chos mtshungs pa dang  bdag med pa mtshungs pa dang  grol ba mtshungs pa dang  rigs tha dad pa theg pa mtshungs pa dang  bsam pa gnyis thob pa dang  sprul pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959548#959565#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8977;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8978;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8979;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8980;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8981# theg pa gcig tu bshad pa'i dgongs pa ni chos mtshungs pa dang  bdag med pa mtshungs pa dang  grol ba mtshungs pa dang  rigs tha dad pa theg pa mtshungs pa dang  bsam pa gnyis thob pa dang  sprul pa'i phyir / / +dang mthar thug pa'i phyir / / +don rnam pa bdun la dgongs nas theg pa gcig nyid yin no zhes gsungs so // /
column6: 0.016#TD4019E.TXT.r#2450550#2450551#TD4019E.TXT.r_5705# ces pa la sogs pas theg pa gcig nyid du bstan pa ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings mtshungs pa'i phyir theg pa gcig nyid de / /
column7: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#291332#291338#TD4026E.TXT.r_2859;TD4026E.TXT.r_2860# mthar thug phyir na theg gcig nyid // / +nyan thos la sogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pas na chos kyi dbyings mtshungs pa'i phyir theg pa gcig pa nyid de / /

column3: bsdu na gnyis te / / +mtshan nyid dang  dbye ba'o // / +de la drug ste / / +mngon par rtogs pa'i dbye ba dang  rnam par gzhag pa'i dbye ba dang  brdar btags don dam gyi    dbye ba dang  dpe'i sgo nas dbye ba dang  skyon dang yon tan gyi sgo nas dbye ba dang  las kyi sgo nas dbye ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959564#959575#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8980;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8981;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8982;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8983;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8984# chos mtshungs pa'i phyir theg PA GCIG STE / / +nyan thos la sogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959576#959594#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8982;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8983;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8984;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8985# chos mtshungs pa'i phyir theg pa gcig tu gsungs te / / +ji lta zhe  na ; / +'di ltar nyan thos la sogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang  rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings su tha mi dad de nam mkha' bzhin no // /
column6: 0.020#TD4029E.TXT.r#2142677#2142677#TD4029E.TXT.r_2866# kun shes par byed pa ni  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir chos yang dag par ston pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos ni so so rang gis rig par bya ba sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang dbang bcu la sogs pa'o // /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316718#2316718#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_685;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_686# de bzhin nyid de nyan thos la sogs pa bgrod par mtshungs pa'i phyir theg pa gcig tu bstan to // / +bdag med par mtshungs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column8: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2005778#2005778#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4077;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4078# bzod par dka' pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni zil gyis mnan par dka' ba'i phyir ro // / +chos mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lung dang rtogs pa'i chos dag mngon sum du byas pa'i phyir dang  dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2051088#2051088#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10564;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10565# rgyu smras pa ni slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ste / / +chos brtan par bkod pa'i phyir dang brtan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: sgrub pa ni dgu ste / / +mtshan nyid dang mnyam pa nyid dang  gzhan gyi don khyad par du bya ba dang  gzhan gyi don sgrub pa'i dbye ba dang  de'i phun sum tshogs pa dang  sgrub pa'i khyad par dang  spyod yul  bsngo ba dang  gzhan gyis nyes pa bzod pa dang  sgrub pa'i che ba nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959595#959604#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8985;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8986;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8987# ji ltar nam mkha' la tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs su med pa ltar nyan thos la sogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings  la yang tha dad pa med de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959604#959625#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8986;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8987;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8988;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8989;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8990;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8991# rang bzhin gcig pas na theg pa gcig pa zhes bya'o // / +chos kyi dbyings la ci'i phyir theg pa zhes bya zhe na / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959759#959764#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9012;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9013;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9011;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9014# rnam par grol ba ci'i phyir theg pa zhes bya zhe na / / +de'i phyir bgrod pa gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smos te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959867#959874#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9024;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9025;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9026;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9023;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9027# rigs pa ci'i phyir theg ba zhes bya zhe na / / +de'i phyir / / +'dis bgrod pa ni theg pa yin pa'i phyir zhes smos te / /

column3: bsam par bya ba de kho na nyid zab mo rnam pa drug gis bstan te / / +don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang  bdag tu lta ba phyin ci log dgag pa dang  phyin ci log dmad  pa dang  bdag med kyang zhi bar rung ba dang  gnyen po ye  shes la 'jug pa dang  ye shes kyi che ba nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959626#959640#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8990;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8991;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8992# bgrod par bya ba shes par bya ba'i yul  chos kyi dbyings nyid theg pa yin te / / +'di ltar chos kyi dbyings khong du chud cing rtogs na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur bas na chos kyi dbyings la theg par gzhag go // /

column3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu ni rnam pa bdun gyis bstan te / / +mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba dang  rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  las dang ldan pa dang  'jug pa dang  che ba'i yon tan no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959639#959654#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8991;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8992;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8993;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8994;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8995;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8996# 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings khong du chud cing rtogs na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur bas na chos kyi dbyings la theg par gzhag go // / +bdag med pa mtshungs pa'i phyir theg pa gcig ste / /
column5: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960205#960206#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9064;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9065;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9066# sprul pa'i phyir yang theg pa gcig tu bshad de / / +ji lta zhe na / /

column3: las la drug ste / / +mthong / / +ston / / +'od zer / / +rnam par rol pa / / +sprul pa dang  zhing dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959655#959663#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8994;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8995;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8996# bdag med par mtshungs pa ni theg pa gcig tu bshad do // / +ji lta zhe na / / +ji ltar nyan thos la sogs pa 'gro ba po'i gang zag la bdag med pa ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa po yang bdag med de / /

column3: yongs su smin pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +bdun dang gzhan no // / +de la bdag yongs su smin pa rgya che ba'i bdag nyid dang bcas pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959664#959673#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8996;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8997# ji ltar nyan thos la sogs pa 'gro ba po'i gang zag la bdag med pa ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa po yang bdag med de / /

column3: dga' dang dad dang rab zhi snying brtse dang  bzod dang yid gzungs mthu can nyid dang ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959674#959685#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8997;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8998;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8999# 'gro ba po'i gang  zag bdag med par 'gro bas na de la dgongs nas theg pa gcig go zhes gsungs pa'i don to // /
column5: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245601#245602#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4035# gnyis pa gang yang med pas sa de las dgongs nas theg pa  ni gcig kho na'o zhes bstan kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad na sems can gyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs dbang po rtul po nyid dang  dbang po 'bring po nyid dang  dbang po rnon po nyid kyi bye brag dang med pa ni ma yin no // /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2312816#2312816#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_215# gcig pa nyid rnam pa gnyis po de las gzhan gnyis pa gang yang med pa'i phyir de las dgongs nas theg pa gcig kho na'o zhes gsungs pa yin gyis / /
column7: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2312569#2312569#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_190# gnyis pa gang yang med pas ngas de las    dgongs nas theg pa ni gcig kho na'o zhes bstan zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa thabs kyis gcig tu gsungs par bstan pa'o // /

column3: mi 'phrogs pa  dang yan lag ldan pa rab // / +de ni rgyal sras yongs su smin pa'i mtshan no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959684#959693#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8997;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8998;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8999;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9000# 'gro ba po'i gang  zag bdag med par 'gro bas na de la dgongs nas theg pa gcig go zhes gsungs pa'i don to // / +gang zag la ci'i phyir theg pa zhes btags she na / /

column3: sems can yongs su smin pa ni lnga ste / / +rang bzhin dang  rab tu dbye ba dang  phan bde'i bsam pa dang  sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa drug gis bsgrub pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959692#959706#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8999;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9000;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9001;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9002;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9003# de'i phyir bgrod bar byed pa de ni theg pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te / /
column5: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1442514#1442514#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4969;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4970# de ltar chos la dmigs pa'i dga' ba dang dad pa'i mu bzhi pa sbyar nas gang zag la dmigs pa'i mu bzhi pa sbyar ba'i phyir / / +gang zag la ni zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te / /
column6: 0.023#TD4065E.TXT.r#430733#430733#TD4065E.TXT.r_525# de ltar gang zag bdag med par 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos so // /

column3: yongs su grub pa'i  don bla na med pa'i byang chub la gnyis te / / +mdor bstan pa dang  rgyas par bshad pa'o // / +dang po la bzhi ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959707#959715#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9002;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9003;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9004# gang zag der bgrod par byed / / +des phyin par byed pas na gang zag la theg pa zhes btags te / /

column3: yang dag par 'grub pa dang  ngo bo nyid dang  dpe dang  sangs rgyas nyid gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid mthu dang bcas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959716#959724#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9004;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9005# 'gro ba po gang zag kun la yang bdag med par 'dra ba'i phyir theg ba gcig ces bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: rgyas par bshad pa la bcu gnyis te / / +de skyabs  gnas bla na med pa dang  gnas yongs su gyur pa dang  mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa dang  rgyun mi 'chad pa dang  zag pa med pa'i dbyings zab pa dang  'byor ba rnam par dbye ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i rgyu dang  chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang  sku gsum     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959725#959747#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9004;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9005;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9006;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9007;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9008;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9009;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9010;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9011# 'gro ba po gang zag kun la yang bdag med par 'dra ba'i phyir theg ba gcig ces bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +rnam par grol ba mtshungs pa'i phyir theg pa / / +gcig pa nyid ni zhes bya ba la / /

column3: dang ye shes rnam par dbye ba dang  sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa dang  tha dad pa las grol ba dang  sangs rgyas nyid la 'jug pa'i thabs dang  phan tshun mdzad pa gcig pa dang  sangs rgyas nyid la spro bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959748#959759#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9009;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9010;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9011;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9012;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9013# nyan thos kyi RNAM PAR GROL BA DANG RANG sangs rgyas kyi RNAM PAR GROL BA DANG  sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba tha dad pa med pa'i phyir te / / +mdo sde dag las  kyang / / +RNAM PAR GROL BA DANG  rnam par grol ba dag la mi 'dra ba med do zhes gsungs so // /
column5: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959612#959612#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8987;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8988# chos kyi dbyings la ci'i phyir theg pa zhes bya zhe na / / +de'i phyir bgrod pa nyid theg pa yin pa'i phyir zhes smos te / /
column6: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959867#959867#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9024;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9025;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9026# rigs pa ci'i phyir theg ba zhes bya zhe na / / +de'i phyir / / +'dis bgrod pa ni theg pa yin pa'i phyir zhes smos te / /

column3: skyabs gnas bla na med pa la gsum  ste ; / +nyon mongs pa las skyob pa dang 'tshe ba las skyob pa dang  'chi ba la sogs pa las skyob pa dang  skyabs chen po bla na med pa'i rgyu mtshan dang  yongs su rdzogs pa dang  yul dus rnam par rdzogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959765#959781#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9013;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9014;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9015# de'i phyir bgrod pa gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smos te / / +theg pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gang gis bgrod par byed pa'i rgyu yang theg pa zhes bya / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959781#959790#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9015;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9016# gang  du bgrod par byed pa'i gnas la yang theg pa zhes bya ba las rnam par grol ba'i gnas bgrod par bya ba'i gnas dang  thob par bya ba'i chos yin pas na de la theg pa zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4019E.TXT.r#2413977#2413978#TD4019E.TXT.r_859;TD4019E.TXT.r_860;TD4019E.TXT.r_861# 'di ni rnal 'byor ldan pa dag / / +mthong ba'i chos la spyod pa'i gnas // / +zhes pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas yin pas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa rnams tshe de nyid la bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur zhes pa'o // /

column3: gnas yongs su gyur pa la bzhi ste / / +gnyen po phun sum  tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang  gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa dang  yon tan gyi dbye ba dang  dpe rnam pa gsum mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959789#959803#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9015;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9016;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9017# gang  du bgrod par byed pa'i gnas la yang theg pa zhes bya ba las rnam par grol ba'i gnas bgrod par bya ba'i gnas dang  thob par bya ba'i chos yin pas na de la theg pa zhes bya'o // / +rigs tha dad pa theg ba mtshungs pa ni nyan thos kyi rigs ma nges pa rnams theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i phyir zhes  bya ba la / /

column3: zag med kyi dbyings zab pa la rnam pa gsum ste / / +mtshan nyid dang gnas dang  phrin las zab pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959804#959813#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9017;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9018# rigs tha dad pa dag theg pa gcig gi sgo nas sangs rgyas par 'gyur bas lam gcig pas na theg pa gcig tu bshad de / /

column3: dang po la bzhi ste / / +rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid  zab pa dang  bdag mchog gi mtshan nyid zab pa dang  lung mi ston pa'i mtshan nyid zab pa dang  rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid zab pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959812#959829#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9017;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9018;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9019# rigs tha dad pa dag theg pa gcig gi sgo nas sangs rgyas par 'gyur bas lam gcig pas na theg pa gcig tu bshad de / / +ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rigs nges pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i rigs ma nges pa dag theg pa chen po la zhugs nas 'tshang rgya ba 'thob pa bzhin  du / /

column3: phrin las zab pa la bcu gcig ste / / +yon tan gnas nyid dang  sems can smin mdzad dang  mthar thug gshegs dang  chos ston phrin  las dang  mdzad pa gcig dang  ye shes dus gcig 'jug dang  rnam par mi rtog dang  ye shes sna tshogs dang  ye shes mi 'jug dang  ye shes khyad par 'phags dang  bde gshegs snying po can no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959828#959838#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9018;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9019;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9020# ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rigs nges pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i rigs ma nges pa dag theg pa chen po la zhugs nas 'tshang rgya ba 'thob pa bzhin  du / / +nyan thos kyi rigs ma nges pa rnams sngon nyan thos kyi spyad pa spyod pa las sangs rgyas sam / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959838#959850#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9019;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9020;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9021;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9022# nyan thos kyi rigs ma nges pa rnams sngon nyan thos kyi spyad pa spyod pa las sangs rgyas sam / / +byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad nas nyan thos kyi spyod pa btang ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959850#959864#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9021;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9022;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9023;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9024;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9025# theg pa chen po'i chos spyad nas sangs rgyas par 'gyur te / / +theg pa chen po nyid kyi lam gyis byang  chub bas na de las dgongs te / /
column7: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#976735#976735#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11114# ma nges par dbye ba zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs ma nges pa dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa las phyis nyan thos la sogs pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad nas bla na med pa'i byang chub ni bskal pa grangs med  pa gsum du bsgrub dgos pas / /

column3: 'byor pa rnam par dbye ba la gsum ste / / +mthu phul du byung ba dang   rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba dang  gzhan du gyur pa'i 'byor ba'i rab tu dbye ba'o // /
column4: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959612#959612#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8987;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8988# chos kyi dbyings la ci'i phyir theg pa zhes bya zhe na / / +de'i phyir bgrod pa nyid theg pa yin pa'i phyir zhes smos te / /

column3: sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i rgyu la bdun te / / +ji ltar smin par mdzad pa dang  ya mtshan che ba nyid dang  smin pa'i thabs mang ba dang  lhun gyis grub cing 'du byed pa dang bral ba dang  de'i dpe dang   gcig nas gcig tu smin pa dang  ngoms pa dang 'phel ba med par bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959875#959883#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9027# rigs 'di ni byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad nas    sangs rgyas bar byed pas na rigs la theg par btags / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959884#959900#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9027;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9028;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9029;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9030# rigs 'di ni byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad nas    sangs rgyas bar byed pas na rigs la theg par btags / /

column3: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la drug ste / / +ngo bo nyid dang  rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  las dang ldan pa dang  'jug pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959901#959910#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9029;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9030# bsam pa gnyis thob pas na theg pa gcig tu gsungs te / / +bsam pa gnyis thob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pas brnyes pa dang  nyan thos kyi bsam pa  rnyed ba'o sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad la bdag nyid du bsam pa thob ba dang zhes bya ba la 'di ltar sa dang po'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa khong du chud pas bdag dang sems can gnyis su mnyam pa nyid kyi bsam pa rnyed do // /

column3: mos pa'i le'u bdun gyis bstan te / / +rnam par dbye ba dang  bar du gcod pa    dang  phan yon dang  theg pa chen po la mos pa len du gzhug pa dang  zhum pa dgag pa dang  bsod nams kyi khyad par dang  mos pa'i 'bras bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959909#959929#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9030;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9031# bsam pa gnyis thob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pas brnyes pa dang  nyan thos kyi bsam pa  rnyed ba'o sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad la bdag nyid du bsam pa thob ba dang zhes bya ba la 'di ltar sa dang po'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa khong du chud pas bdag dang sems can gnyis su mnyam pa nyid kyi bsam pa rnyed do // /

column3: chos tshol ba la bcu dgu ste / / +dmigs pa yongs su tshol ba dang  de rnyed pa dang  yid la byed pa dang  chos kyi de kho na nyid dang  de kho na  nyid sgyu ma lta bur yongs su tshol ba dang  shes bya yongs su tshol ba dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam byang yongs su tshol ba dang  rnam par rig pa tsam dang  mtshan nyid dang rnam par gol ba dang  ngo bo nyid med pa dang  mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang  theg pa gcig pa nyid dang  rig  pa'i gnas dang  khams brtas pa dang  chos tshol ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang  rgyu nyid du dang  spang bya rnam par rtog pa tshol ba dang  mjug bsdu ba phan yon dang bcas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959930#959947#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9030;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9031;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9032;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9033# bsam pa gnyis thob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pas brnyes pa dang  nyan thos kyi bsam pa  rnyed ba'o sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad la bdag nyid du bsam pa THOB BA DANG ZHES BYA ba la 'di ltar sa dang po'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa khong du chud pas bdag dang sems can gnyis su mnyam pa nyid kyi bsam pa rnyed do // / +mnyam pa nyid kyi  bsam pa des gnyis nas sa bcu'i bar du bsgoms pas sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dus na rnam par dag pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959948#959955#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9033;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9034# sems can gzhan yin pa bdag kyang de yin no zhes sems can dang bdag tu rang bzhin gcig pa'i dgongs pa brnyes  bas na theg pa gcig tu bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959956#959965#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9033;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9034# sems can gzhan yin pa bdag kyang de yin no zhes sems can dang bdag tu rang bzhin gcig pa'i dgongs pa brnyes  bas na theg pa gcig tu bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +nyan thos dag gi rigs su nges pa rnams sngon byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la spyad pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi bsam par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la / /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959966#959975#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9034;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9035;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9036;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9037;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9038# nyan thos dag gi rigs su nges pa rnams sngon byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la spyad pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi bsam par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la / / +nyan thos de yi rigs su nges // /

column3: de kho na sgyu ma lta bur tshol ba la bcu gcig ste / / +sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid dang  dus gcig tu rtogs  par spyod pa dang  dpe dang sbyar ba dang  don dang sbyar ba dang  dgos pa dang sbyar ba dang  rgyu mtshan dang sbyar ba dang  dpe'i dbye ba dang  mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i dbye ba dang  spang ba'i tshul dang  thar pa'i dpe dang  sgyu ma la sogs pa dpe brgyad kyi don bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959976#959993#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9037;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9038# nyan thos nyid ni rigs nges  pa'o // / +nyan thos kyi rigs su nges pa rnams sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa las nyan thos kyi rigs nges pa yod pas na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa btang nas nyan thos kyi theg par zhugs te nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das par mya ngan las 'das so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959994#960011#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9038;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9039;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9040# nyan thos kyi rigs su nges pa rnams sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa las nyan thos kyi rigs nges pa yod pas na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa btang nas nyan thos kyi theg par zhugs te nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das par mya ngan las 'das so // /

column3: chos  ston pa la bcu gcig ste / / +ser sna dgag pa dang  chos don med pa ma yin pa dang  ston pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang  ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang  tshig phun sum tshogs pa dang  yi ge phun sum tshogs pa dang  ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid dang  don phun sum tshogs pa dang   ldem por dgongs pa dang  dgongs pa rnam par dbye ba dang  shin tu rgyas pa bsdus pa phan yon dang bcas pa bstan pa dang  chos bstan pa'i phan yon no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960010#960035#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9040;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9041# de ltar mdzad bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pas sangs rgyas so zhes dgongs pa bzhin du nyan thos de dag kyang bdag cag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas 'tshang rgya  bar 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas kyi bsam pa 'thob par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960032#960047#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9040;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9041;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9042;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9043;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9044# de ltar mdzad bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pas sangs rgyas so zhes dgongs pa bzhin du nyan thos de dag kyang bdag cag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas 'tshang rgya  bar 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas kyi bsam pa 'thob par 'gyur te / / +de la dgongs nas kyang theg pa gcig tu gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960123#960131#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9055;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9054# nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang  sangs rgyas gnyis su sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa'i sems kyi rgyud tha dad  PA MA YIN PA THOB pa'i phyir / /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960171#960175#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9059;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9060;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9058# nyan thos rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang mthun pa'i bsam pa thob pas / / +de la dgongs nas theg pa gcig tu bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.016#TD4017E.TXT.r#2671218#2671218#TD4017E.TXT.r_2233;TD4017E.TXT.r_2234# ces pa'i bar du ni yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i gang zag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro // / +de yang sangs rgyas dran pa'i bsam pa rdzogs  pa dang  rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o // /
column9: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349367#1349368#TD4037E.TXT.r_4528;TD4037E.TXT.r_4529# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // / +mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1350017#1350018#TD4037E.TXT.r_4597;TD4037E.TXT.r_4598# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs  pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // / +mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1364912#1364913#TD4037E.TXT.r_6621;TD4037E.TXT.r_6622# chos bzhi po de dag kho nas 'das pa dang  ma  'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba'i dus dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas / / +mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur / /

column3: bsgrub pa'i le'u la brgyad de / / +rnam par dbye ba dang  sgrub pa la bag yod par bya ba dang  nyon mongs pa kho nas nyon mongs pa las  nges par 'byung ba dang  theg pa dman pa yid la byed pa spang ba dang  rang bzhin gyis dag pa la skrag pa spang ba dang  chags pa las skyes pa'i ltung ba dgag pa dang  ji ltar gang du sgrub pa dang  sgrub pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960044#960055#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9042;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9043;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9044;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9045# rgyu gang gis sangs rgyas kyi bsam pa thob ce na / / +de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhes bya ba smos te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960055#960063#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9044;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9045;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9046;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9047# sangs rgyas kyi bsam pa thob pa yang de bzhin     // / +gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyus thob bo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960064#960083#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9046;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9047;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9048;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9049;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9050# bsam pa ji tsam zhig thob ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gzung ba'i bye brag gi phyogs thob pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te / /

column3: bye brag tu shes par bya ba'i gdams ngag     // / +dang rjes su bstan pa la bcu gsum ste / / +mos pa rnam par 'phel ba dang  de bzhin du ni tshogs bsags pa la sogs pa dang  chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa las gdams ngag rnyed pa dang  de la dmigs pa'i sems drug bstan pa dang   yid la byed pa bcu gcig bstan pa dang  zhi gnas kyi sems dgu bstan pa dang  de las rim gyis bsam gtan las su rung ba can yon tan dang bcas pa thob pa dang  nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang  mthong ba'i lam dang  de'i mtshan  nyid rnam par gzhag pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid dang  bsgom pa'i lam dang  gdams ngag gi che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960083#960092#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9050;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9051# de bzhin gshegs  pa dang ldan pa'i dgongs pa'i khyad par la de bzhin gshegs pas gzung ba'i bye brag ces bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960092#960107#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9051;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9052;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9053;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9054# nyan thos de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi bsam pa rnyed pa yang thang cig gcig rnyed kyi gtan du bsam pa de dang mi ldan pas na phyogs tsam thob ba zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960107#960116#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9052;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9053;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9054;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9055# rnam pa ji lta bus thob pas sangs rgyas  kyi bsam pa thob pa ni / / +de'i phyir / / +rgyud tha dad pa ma yin pas thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te / /
column7: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960022#960024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9040# de ltar mdzad bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pas sangs rgyas so zhes dgongs pa bzhin du nyan thos de dag kyang bdag cag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas 'tshang rgya  bar 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas kyi bsam pa 'thob par 'gyur te / /
column8: 0.019#TD4019E.TXT.r#2419429#2419429#TD4019E.TXT.r_1554;TD4019E.TXT.r_1555# 'og nas don rjod  par byed pa'i bye brag sna tshogs ston par 'gyur ba'o // / +lha la sogs pa'i 'gro ba'i khyad par yang de bzhin te shes par zad do // /
column9: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1181502#1181503#TD4047E.TXT.r_8691;TD4047E.TXT.r_8692# dka' ba'i bzod pa yang rnam  pa gsum du rnam par gzhag par bya ste / / +bzod par bya ba'i khyad par dang  bzod par byed pa'i khyad par dang  gnod pa'i dngos po'i khyad par ro // /

column3: thabs dang ldan pa'i las rnam par dbye ba la gsum ste / / +kun nas slong ba'i thabs dang  lta ba'i thabs dang  'khor  gsum yongs su dag pa'i thabs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960130#960142#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9055;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9056# nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang  sangs rgyas gnyis su sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa'i sems kyi rgyud tha dad  pa ma yin pa thob pa'i phyir / /

column3: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la / / +grangs dang dpe'i mtshan nyid go rims dang / / +nges pa'i tshig dang goms bya yon tan dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960143#960153#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9056;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9057# sangs rgyas kyi bsam ba'i phyogs tsam zhig thob bo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de ltar gcig pa'i bsam pa thob pas sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams gcig pa'i phyir theg pa gcig go zhes bya ba la gong du bshad pa ltar na / /
column5: 0.023#TD4029E.TXT.r#2139096#2139097#TD4029E.TXT.r_2411# de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos rnams bsam pa gcig pa nyid rnyed pa'i phyir theg pa gcig pa nyid do // /

column3: de dag rab dbye bsdu dang mi mthun phyogs // / +yon tan phan tshun rnam nges yin shes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960152#960167#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9057;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9058;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9059# de ltar gcig pa'i bsam pa thob pas sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams gcig pa'i phyir theg pa gcig go zhes bya ba la gong du bshad pa ltar na / /

column3: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la  drug ste / / +ngo bo dang byed pa dang  las dang  grangs nges pa dang  rab tu dbye ba dang  phan yon no // /
mchod la sogs pa bzhi ni / / +sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang  dge bshes bsten pa dang  tshad med pa bsgom pa dang  de dag mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960174#960195#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9060;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9061;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9062;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9063# de la dgongs nas theg pa gcig tu bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316901#2316902#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_709# lan brgya phrag  grangs med par nyan thos kyi theg pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / /

column3: mchod pa la rgyu mtshan dang ni  yongs bsngo dang / / +rten dang dngos dang rgyu dang ni // /
column4: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960245#960245#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9068# de'i phyir mdo sde de dang de dag las kyang ni lan    brgya stong du mar nyan thos kyi theg par yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes gsungs te / /

column3: ye shes dang ni zhing dag dang / / +gnas kyi sgo nas rab tu bstan // / +dge bshes bsten pa bzhi dang ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960196#960206#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9062;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9063;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9064;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9065;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9066# nga ni lan brgya phrag du mar nyan thos kyi theg pas  yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes gsungs pa ste / / +'dul ba rnams kyi don du de bzhin du sprul pa bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959653#959654#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8994;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8995;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8996# bdag med par mtshungs pa ni theg pa gcig tu bshad do // / +ji lta zhe na / /

column3: rgyu mtshan dang ni yongs bsngo dang / / +rgyu dang ye shes zhing dag dang / / +gnas kyi sgo nas rab tu bstan // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960207#960218#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9064;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9065;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9066# sprul pa'i phyir yang theg pa gcig tu bshad de / / +ji lta zhe na / / +ji ltar nyan thos rnams rang gi theg pas mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs  pa'i sprul pas kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bstan te / /

column3: tshad med pa la gsum ste / / +khyad par dang  rab tu dbye ba dang  snying rje'i rnam par dbye ba'o // / +snying rje'i rnam par dbye ba la nyi shu rtsa gnyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960219#960235#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9066;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9067;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9068# ji ltar nyan thos rnams rang gi theg pas mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs  pa'i sprul pas kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bstan te / /

column3: dmigs pa'i rab tu dbye ba dang  'bras bu lnga dang  srid pa dang zhi bar mi gnas pa dang  'khor ba yongs su shes pa dang  snying rje'i rgyu rnam par dbye ba dang  ljon shing    gi dpe dang  phan yon dang  snying rje chags pa dang bral ba dang  snying rje byams pas khyad par du 'phags pa dang skrag pa dang dga' ba'i rgyu mtshan dang  snying rje'i sdug bsngal gyis bde ba zil gyis gnon pa dang  snying rjes byin pa'i pan yon dang  sdug bsngal khas len pa dang  rnam  pa gsum po dang  de'i 'bras bu 'phel ba dang  sbyin pa la spro ba bskyed pa dang  gzhan bde bas bde ba nyams su myong ba dang  sbyin pa la rjes su ston pa dang  brtse bas sbyin pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang  nye bar spyad pa'i khyad par gyis dga' ba dang  pha rol tu phyin pa nye  bar bsgrub pa dang  snying rje'i rkyen rnam pa bzhi dang  snying rje chen po mchog gi rnam pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960229#960243#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9067;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9068# nyan thos dang sprul pa gnyis nyan thos kyi theg pas mya ngan las 'das par theg pa gcig pas na theg pa gcig tu bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960244#960266#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9068;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9069;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9070# de'i phyir mdo sde de dang de dag las kyang ni lan    brgya stong du mar nyan thos kyi theg par yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes gsungs te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960266#960288#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9070;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9071;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9072;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9073# 'dul bar 'gyur  ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du sprul pas mya ngan las 'das par bstan to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960288#960301#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9073;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9074# mthar thug pa'i phyir theg pa gcig tu bshad de  mthar thug pa zhes bya ba dang  mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba dang  phul du phyin pa zhes bya ba dag don gcig ste / /
column8: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960348#960354#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9078;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9077;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9079# mchog tu phyin pa ni de gcig pur zad pa'i theg pa chen po gcig tu bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959527#959527#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8974;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8975;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8976;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8977# sprul    ba dang ni mthar thug phyir // / +theg pa gcig pa nyid yin no // / +zhes bya ba la / / +theg pa gcig tu bshad pa'i dgongs pa ni chos mtshungs pa dang  bdag med pa mtshungs pa dang  grol ba mtshungs pa dang  rigs tha dad pa theg pa mtshungs pa dang  bsam pa gnyis thob pa dang  sprul pa'i phyir / /
column10: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1214102#1214102#TD4047E.TXT.r_13215;TD4047E.TXT.r_13216# rnam par shes pa'i khams bstan te / / +sems kun nas nyon mongs pas  sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur la / /

column3: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa la nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste / / +ngo tsha'i rnam par dbye ba dang  brtan pa dang  mi skyo ba dang  bstan bcos shes pa dang  'jig rten shes pa dang  rton pa dang  so  so yang dag par rig pa dang  tshogs gnyis dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  thabs la  mkhas pa dang  gzungs dang  smon lam dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  chos kyi sdom dang  de'i skad cig ma dang  bdag med pa dang  ngo tsha la sogs pa'i las mdor bsdus pa bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960300#960311#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9073;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9074;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9075# mthar thug pa'i phyir theg pa gcig tu bshad de  mthar thug pa zhes bya ba dang  mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba dang  phul du phyin pa zhes bya ba dag don gcig ste / / +dper na 'jig rten na yang gang dpa' ba dang mdzangs pa phul du phyin pa rnams la mi 'di gcig pur zad kyi mi gzhan med de zhes smra ba ltar / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960311#960325#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9074;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9075;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9076# dper na 'jig rten na yang gang dpa' ba dang mdzangs pa phul du phyin pa rnams la mi 'di gcig pur zad kyi mi gzhan med de zhes smra ba ltar / / +rgyu'i chos theg pa chen po nyid kyang  theg pa gzhan la khyad zhugs te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960325#960333#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9076;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9077# phul du phyin pa dang 'bras bu'i chos sangs rgyas su gyur pa nyid sangs rgyas thob pa yang phul du phyin pa yin te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960334#960343#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9077;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9078# sangs rgyas phyen chad de las lhag par bgrod cing thob par bya ba'i chos khyad par can gzhan med pas na sangs rgyas nyid la theg pa zhes btags  te ; /

column3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste / / +ngo mtshar che ba dang mi che ba  rnam par dbye ba dang  sems mnyam pa nyid dang  phan 'dogs pa dang  lan du phan 'dogs pa dang  smon pa dang  sbyor ba chud mi za ba dang  yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang  yongs su nyams pa dang  khyad par can gyi chos rnam par dbye ba dang  bcos ma dang bcos ma min  pa'i yon tan dang  'dul ba rnam par dbye ba dang  lung bstan pa dang  nges par 'gyur ba dang  gdon mi za bar bya dgos pa dang  rtag par bya ba dang  gtso bo'i dngos po dang  gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa dang  yongs su tshol ba dang  yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960355#960365#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9079;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9080;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9081# de ltar mdo sde de dang de la dgongs pa de dang des theg pa gcig tu rig par bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960366#960377#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9081;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9082# gong du bshad pa ltar na theg pa gsum yod mod kyi  lang kar gshegs pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde de dang de dag gi nang nas theg pa gcig tu zad de / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960377#960386#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9081;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9082# gong du bshad pa ltar na theg pa gsum yod mod kyi  lang kar gshegs pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde de dang de dag gi nang nas theg pa gcig tu zad de / / +gsum du med do zhes bshad pa las yang chos gcig las dgongs pa de dang de dag la dgongs nas theg pa gcig tu bshad par rig par bya ste / /
column7: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901595#901595#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1531# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'i rgyu byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rgya chen po lang kar gshegs pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde de dang de dag  nas 'byung ba rnams la rtag tu spyan byed de / /
column8: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977673#977673#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11192# de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos punda r'i ka las theg pa ni gcig tu zad kyi gsum du med do zhes bshad pa dang  nyan thos la sogs pa 'tshang rgya ba ma yin yang 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na theg pa chen po la  'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung bstan te / /

column3: shes pa dang  dpag tu med pa dang  bshad pa'i 'bras bu dang  theg pa chen po dang  de'i 'bras bu dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dbye ba dang  de'i mtshan gyi rnam par dbye ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960387#960399#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9082;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9083;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9084# gsum du med do zhes bshad pa las yang chos gcig las dgongs pa de dang de dag la dgongs nas theg pa gcig tu bshad par rig par bya ste / /
column5: 0.021#TD4026E.TXT.r#291485#291485#TD4026E.TXT.r_2878;TD4026E.TXT.r_2879;TD4026E.TXT.r_2880# de ltar bas na mod de dang de las ni dgongs pa de dang des theg pa gcig pa  nyid du gsungs par rig par bya'i // / +theg pa gsum med pa ni ma yin no // / +yang ci'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs pa de dang des theg pa gcig pa nyid du bshad ce na / /

column3: yongs su grub pa mthar thug pa'i skabs la bco brgyad de / / +rtags dang  phyogs dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa dang  yongs su 'dzin pa dang  skye ba dang gnas pa dang  sa rnam par dbye ba mdor bstan pa dang  sa'i mtshan nyid dang  de'i gang zag dang  de la bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa dang  phung po rnam par gzhag pa dang  grub pa dang   sa la zhugs pa'i rtags dang  pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa'i rtags dang  de'i phan yon dang  sa'i nges pa'i tshig dang  thob pa dang  spyod pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnam par dbye ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960400#960409#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9083;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9084;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9085# nges pa'i don dun theg pa gsum med pa  ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ci'i phyir dgongs pa de dang des theg pa gcig tu sangs rgyas bshad ce na zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960410#960426#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9084;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9085;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9086# ci'i phyir dgongs pa de dang des theg pa gcig tu sangs rgyas bshad ce na zhes bya ba la / / +de ltar theg pa gsum yod kyang dgongs pa rnam pa bdun po de dang de dag la dgongs nas theg pa gcig tu bshad pa la don dang dgongs pa ci yod ces bya ba'i don to //// /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960426#960437#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9085;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9086;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9087;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9088;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9089;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9090;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9091# de ltar theg pa gsum yod kyang dgongs pa rnam pa bdun po de dang de dag la dgongs nas theg pa gcig tu bshad pa la don dang dgongs pa ci yod ces bya ba'i don to //// / +kha cig dag ni drang ba'i phyir // /
column7: 0.020#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#879298#879298#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18123;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18124# 'di dag gis ston pa go bar byed ces bya ba'i don te / / +gzhan la de dag rnam par 'byed pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#894382#894382#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_715;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_716# stong pa zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang tshig gzhan la don gzhan 'byung bas brtag dka' ba'i phyir dka' ba'o // / +don rnams kyang rtogs par dka' bas na zab pa'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4061E.TXT.r#1542591#1542591#TD4061E.TXT.r_4079;TD4061E.TXT.r_4080# dgos pa bstan ba la yang gus par mnyan par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +kha cig mdo sde'i don khong du chud par mi nus ba dag 'byung bas de dag la chos tsam la yang gus bar mnyan pas bsod nams  bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang  don khong du chud pa la smos bas shes rab kyi khams bskyed par bya ba'i phyir / /
column10: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1012189#1012189#TD4054E.TXT.r_3557;TD4054E.TXT.r_3558# dngos po'i gnas skabs de nyid la rang bzhin gyi dbang nyams pa dang  kha cig tu gzhan dag gis bdag gir byas par rig par bya'o // / +nye ba'i mtshan nyid gang / /
column11: 0.029#TD4010E.TXT.r#2286246#2286246#TD4010E.TXT.r_7100;TD4010E.TXT.r_7101# gzhan yang gzhon nu zhes bya ba la sogs    pas ni yid kyi sdom pa rnam pa gzhan bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // / +log par lta ba spang ba'i phyir log par lta ba dang 'grogs par mi byed ces bya ba ni log par lta ba'i bag chags spang ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1139163#1139163#TD4047E.TXT.r_2575;TD4047E.TXT.r_2576# de dag ni phyin ci log gi shes rab  kyi rigs pa ma yin pa'i don la mkhas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +rigs pa'i don rnams gzhan dag la rab tu bsgrub pa la mkhas pa ni mdzangs pa zhes bya'o // /
column13: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#659647#659647#TD4069E.TXT.r_5211;TD4069E.TXT.r_5212# mdo sde'i don bshad pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir te / / +mdo sde'i don gzhan bshad pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: de yang bsdu na gnyis te / / +rgyu'i khyad par dang  ngo bo'i sgo nas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960438#960447#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9089;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9090;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9091;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9092# theg pa gcig tu bstan pa yin // / +zhes bya ba la / / +ma nges pa'i rigs can rnams kyi don du dgongs nas sangs rgyas kyis theg pa gcig go zhes gsungs  te ; /

column3: rgyu la drug ste / / +rtags dang  phyogs dang  bsam pa dang  yongs su 'dzin pa dang  skye ba dang  sa'i sgo nas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960446#960457#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9091;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9092;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9093# ma nges pa'i rigs can rnams kyi don du dgongs nas sangs rgyas kyis theg pa gcig go zhes gsungs  te ; / +ma nges pa'i rigs can ni nyan thos kyi rigs ma nges pa dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs ma nges pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i rigs ma nges pa'o // /
column5: 0.021#TD4026E.TXT.r#291371#291371#TD4026E.TXT.r_2866# nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs su ma nges pa rnams theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bas na rigs     // /

column3: ngo bo'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bco brgyad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960456#960465#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9092;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9093# ma nges pa'i rigs can ni nyan thos kyi rigs ma nges pa dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs ma nges pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i rigs ma nges pa'o // / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs ma nges bdag theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la btsud nas sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir yang theg pa  gcig tu bshad pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i rigs ma nges pa dag 'khor ba na phan btags kyang gnod par byed pa'i sems can dang  gnod par ma byas kyang gnod par byed pa dang  dgos pa med par yang gnod pa byed pa dag mthong nas 'khor bar skyo ste / /

column3: tshad med pa dang  rnam thar la sogs pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas mkhyen pa dang  so so yang dag par  rig pa dang  mngon par shes pa dang  mtshan dang  dpe byad dang  yongs su dag pa dang  stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa dang  bsrung med dran pa nyer gnas dang  bag chags bcom pa dang  bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang  thugs rje chen po dang  ma 'dres pa'i yon tan dang   thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'o //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960464#960482#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9093# nyan thos DANG RANG SANGS RGYAS KYI rigs ma nges bdag theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la btsud nas sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir yang theg pa  gcig tu bshad pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i rigs ma nges pa dag 'khor ba na phan btags kyang gnod par byed pa'i sems can dang  gnod par ma byas kyang gnod par byed pa dang  dgos pa med par yang gnod pa byed pa dag mthong nas 'khor bar skyo ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960483#960498#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9093;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9094# nyan thos DANG RANG SANGS RGYAS KYI rigs ma nges bdag theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la btsud nas sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir yang theg pa  gcig tu bshad pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i rigs ma nges pa dag 'khor ba na phan btags kyang gnod par byed pa'i sems can dang  gnod par ma byas kyang gnod par byed pa dang  dgos pa med par yang gnod pa byed pa dag mthong nas 'khor bar skyo ste / /

column3: rgyal sras mi pham mgon las mngon sum du // / +rna ba'i snyim pas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'thungs pas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960499#960511#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9094;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9095# nyan thos kyi mya ngan las  'das bar 'jug par 'dod pa rnams nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das par mi btang zhing gzung bar bya ba'i phyir theg pa gcig tu bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: skal ldan gang g'a dha ra'i slob ma ni // / +bram ze rin  chen rdo rjes legs bzung nas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960512#960526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9095;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9096;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9097# theg pa gcig tu bshad pas ji ltar drang zhing gzung bar 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: theg chen mdo sde ma lus pa yi don // / +mkhas pa dag par byed pa'i rgyan bshad pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#960525#960535#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9096;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9097;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9098;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9099# ji ltar theg pa ni gcig par zad do zhes bshad pa dang de dag 'di  snyam du sems te / / +mthar bskor na yang theg pa chen po nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur bas / /

column6: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#2162021#2162023#TD4047E.TXT.r_10050# thams  cad kyi thams cad du mchod pa'i yo byad med par gyur na mchod pa la mkhas pa'i bsod nams 'phel bar bya ba'i thabs bstan pa ni 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khyad par ni yul rgya chen po khyab par 'jug pa'i mchod pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa  thams cad kyi mchod par yongs su gzung nas chung ngu dang  'bring dang  chen po'i bye brag gis nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par byed do // /

column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2452948#2452950#TD4037E.TXT.r_5242# de la mi 'dod pas byas pa'i sdug bsngal ni tshe ring bar 'dod pa la mi 'dod bzhin du tshe thung bar 'gyur ba las byung ba dang  byad bzang bar 'dod pa las kyang mi 'dod bzhin  du byad ngan par 'gyur ba dang  rigs mthon por skye bar 'dod pa las kyang mi 'dod bzhin du rigs dma' bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang  dbang phyug 'dod pa las kyang mi 'dod bzhin du dbul por 'gyur ba dang  stobs che bar 'dod pa las kyang mi 'dod bzhin du stobs chung  ngur 'gyur ba las byung ba dang  shes bya shes par 'dod pa las kyang mi 'dod bzhin du rmongs pa'i shes pa kun du spyod pa las byung ba dang  pha rol pham par 'dod pa las kyang / /
column6: 0.0#TD4057E.TXT.r#2532720#2532723#TD4057E.TXT.r_319;TD4057E.TXT.r_320# de yang ji ltar don ji lta ba bzhin du ma yin zhe na / / +sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ji bzhin ma shes phyir / /

column3: dmigs pa yongs su tshol ba dang  de rnyed pa dang  yid la byed pa dang  chos kyi de kho na nyid dang  de kho na  nyid sgyu ma lta bur yongs su tshol ba dang  shes bya yongs su tshol ba dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam byang yongs su tshol ba dang  rnam par rig pa tsam dang  mtshan nyid dang rnam par gol ba dang  ngo bo nyid med pa dang  mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang  theg pa gcig pa nyid dang  rig  pa'i gnas dang  khams brtas pa dang  chos tshol ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang  rgyu nyid du dang  spang bya rnam par rtog pa tshol ba dang  mjug bsdu ba phan yon dang bcas pa'o // /

column11: 0.0#TD4047E.TXT.r#2162150#2162155#TD4047E.TXT.r_10055# tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya ba nyid kyis dang  'dus byas kyi nyes dmigs bsgom pa nyid kyis dang  mya ngan las 'das pa'i phan yon mthong bas dang  dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa'i lam rjes su dran pa bsgom pa nyid kyis dang  chos bdag med pa yid la  byed pa bsgom pa nyid kyis dang  byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa gsum yang dag par blangs pas dang  byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang mngon par mi 'phral ba'i bya ba nyid kyis dang  pha rol tu phyin pa bsdu'i dngos po la sbyar bas so // /
column12: 5.960#TD4057E.TXT.r#2532729#2532731#TD4057E.TXT.r_320;TD4057E.TXT.r_321# sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ji bzhin ma shes phyir / /

column3: sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid dang  dus gcig tu rtogs  par spyod pa dang  dpe dang sbyar ba dang  don dang sbyar ba dang  dgos pa dang sbyar ba dang  rgyu mtshan dang sbyar ba dang  dpe'i dbye ba dang  mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i dbye ba dang  spang ba'i tshul dang  thar pa'i dpe dang  sgyu ma la sogs pa dpe brgyad kyi don bstan pa'o // /

column3: ser sna dgag pa dang  chos don med pa ma yin pa dang  ston pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang  ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang  tshig phun sum tshogs pa dang  yi ge phun sum tshogs pa dang  ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid dang  don phun sum tshogs pa dang   ldem por dgongs pa dang  dgongs pa rnam par dbye ba dang  shin tu rgyas pa bsdus pa phan yon dang bcas pa bstan pa dang  chos bstan pa'i phan yon no // /

column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#317347#317356#TD4035E.TXT.r_7972;TD4035E.TXT.r_7973;TD4035E.TXT.r_7974# ci yang med pa'i skye mched 'di ni zag pa med pa'i sems kyis sa'i mtha' yin te / / +de ni btang snyoms  rnams kyi mchog yin no // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#317357#317366#TD4035E.TXT.r_7973;TD4035E.TXT.r_7974# de ni btang snyoms  rnams kyi mchog yin no // / +de bas na ji ltar dge slong dgra bcom pa bde ba dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa spyod pa thams cad la kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du / /

column3: bsgrub pa'i le'u la brgyad de / / +rnam par dbye ba dang  sgrub pa la bag yod par bya ba dang  nyon mongs pa kho nas nyon mongs pa las  nges par 'byung ba dang  theg pa dman pa yid la byed pa spang ba dang  rang bzhin gyis dag pa la skrag pa spang ba dang  chags pa las skyes pa'i ltung ba dgag pa dang  ji ltar gang du sgrub pa dang  sgrub pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o // /

column9: 0.010#TD4047E.TXT.r#2162306#2162307#TD4047E.TXT.r_10064;TD4047E.TXT.r_10065# phan 'dogs  pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam pa thams cad kyis shin tu phan 'dogs pa sgrub par byed pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro // / +mchog tu gyur pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni sems can thams cad kyi dam par gyur pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: snying rje'i rnam par dbye ba la nyi shu rtsa gnyis te / /

dmigs pa'i rab tu dbye ba dang  'bras bu lnga dang  srid pa dang zhi bar mi gnas pa dang  'khor ba yongs su shes pa dang  snying rje'i rgyu rnam par dbye ba dang  ljon shing    gi dpe dang  phan yon dang  snying rje chags pa dang bral ba dang  snying rje byams pas khyad par du 'phags pa dang skrag pa dang dga' ba'i rgyu mtshan dang  snying rje'i sdug bsngal gyis bde ba zil gyis gnon pa dang  snying rjes byin pa'i pan yon dang  sdug bsngal khas len pa dang  rnam  pa gsum po dang  de'i 'bras bu 'phel ba dang  sbyin pa la spro ba bskyed pa dang  gzhan bde bas bde ba nyams su myong ba dang  sbyin pa la rjes su ston pa dang  brtse bas sbyin pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang  nye bar spyad pa'i khyad par gyis dga' ba dang  pha rol tu phyin pa nye  bar bsgrub pa dang  snying rje'i rkyen rnam pa bzhi dang  snying rje chen po mchog gi rnam pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#317709#317716#TD4035E.TXT.r_8011;TD4035E.TXT.r_8012;TD4035E.TXT.r_8013# ha cang brtun ngas pa'i nyes pas ni ha cang zhum par byed de / / +bya khug rta btsir ba bzhin no / /

column11: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#317784#317794#TD4035E.TXT.r_8020;TD4035E.TXT.r_8021# de 'gro yang rung gnas kyang rung ste / /

column13: 0.0#TD4047E.TXT.r#2162731#2162736#TD4047E.TXT.r_10092# bsam gtan dang po nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du dang  byams pa la sogs pa tshang med pa bzhi dang  byang chub sems dpa'i ting ngo 'dzin sna tshogs pa de lta bu    thob pa ni zhi gnas thob pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: ngo tsha'i rnam par dbye ba dang  brtan pa dang  mi skyo ba dang  bstan bcos shes pa dang  'jig rten shes pa dang  rton pa dang  so  so yang dag par rig pa dang  tshogs gnyis dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  thabs la  mkhas pa dang  gzungs dang  smon lam dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  chos kyi sdom dang  de'i skad cig ma dang  bdag med pa dang  ngo tsha la sogs pa'i las mdor bsdus pa bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#317822#317835#TD4035E.TXT.r_8023;TD4035E.TXT.r_8024;TD4035E.TXT.r_8025# yang na ting nge 'dzin des bdag nyid ni mchog tu mthong la / / +gzhan ni dma' bar bdag nyid kun tu 'dzin par byed na / /

column12: 5.960#TD4047E.TXT.r#2162856#2162861#TD4047E.TXT.r_10103# ngan du brjod kyang rung 'gyur ba mi bskyed par gzhan gyi don la sems  par byed pa dang  khros pa la lan du mi khro ba yin / /

column5: 0.011#TD4047E.TXT.r#2162922#2162927#TD4047E.TXT.r_10107# so sor rtog pa'i stobs kyis yid yongs su mi skyo ba yin no zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa mang pa nyid do // /

column3: ngo mtshar che ba dang mi che ba  rnam par dbye ba dang  sems mnyam pa nyid dang  phan 'dogs pa dang  lan du phan 'dogs pa dang  smon pa dang  sbyor ba chud mi za ba dang  yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang  yongs su nyams pa dang  khyad par can gyi chos rnam par dbye ba dang  bcos ma dang bcos ma min  pa'i yon tan dang  'dul ba rnam par dbye ba dang  lung bstan pa dang  nges par 'gyur ba dang  gdon mi za bar bya dgos pa dang  rtag par bya ba dang  gtso bo'i dngos po dang  gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa dang  yongs su tshol ba dang  yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du     // /

column10: 0.024#TD4098E.TXT.r#2521086#2521086#TD4098E.TXT.r_600;TD4098E.TXT.r_601# thog ma med pa dang ldan pa'i 'khor ba na / / +rtag tu bdag gi chu srin 'dzin khris zin pa'i rgyud can gyis de thog ma kho nar chos tsam du mthong ba'i  phyir chos shes pa zhes bya'o // /
column11: 0.028#TD4012E.TXT.r#2887361#2887361#TD4012E.TXT.r_853# rgyas kyi zhing rnams rin po che sna tshogs dang  na bza' dang  bla re dang  gdugs dang  rgyal mtshan dang  ba dan dang  rin po che'i dril bu'i phreng ba dang spos dang  me tog dang  bdug pa dang  mar me dang  phreng ba la sogs pa dang  sil  snyan mi'i las 'das pa 'phrul gyi rgyan rnams kyis rab tu brgyan pa dang  mi'i ma yin pa'i 'phrul gyi zhal zas ro lnga brgya dang ldan pa mchog tu bde ba bskyed pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol zhing phul ba bas / /

column3: shes pa dang  dpag tu med pa dang  bshad pa'i 'bras bu dang  theg pa chen po dang  de'i 'bras bu dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dbye ba dang  de'i mtshan gyi rnam par dbye ba'o // /

column9: 0.017#TD4047E.TXT.r#2132553#2132555#TD4047E.TXT.r_7764# dper na nyan thos kyi 'dul ba la la la zhig la res 'ga' tsam dngos po'i 'gal ba byung na yang dngos po de nyid kyi nyes par 'gyur ba  bzhin DU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' RNAMS KYI yang de dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir nyes pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // /

column13: 0.019#TD4061E.TXT.r#2799365#2799365#TD4061E.TXT.r_4385;TD4061E.TXT.r_4386# sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'jug ngogs bde ba la yang de bzhin te / / +'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma med par bya ba'i phyir dang  'dod pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang  yang 'byung ba'i  sred pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang  bsam gtan dang  mngon par shes pa dang  tshad med pa dang  rnam par thar pa la sogs pa yon tan khyad par can gyi dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir dang  tshu rol gyi 'gram 'jig tshogs nas pha rol gyi 'gram mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar  bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column14: 0.020#TD4051E.TXT.r#2242794#2242794#TD4051E.TXT.r_672# de ltar rgyu'i rkyen du rnam par gzhag sde zhes bya ba ni sa bon yongs su 'dzin pa dang ldan pa ji skad bshad pa ltar de gzhan du ma yin  no ; / /
